page.internal-name: Director of Mavin Duck Farm Branch (Member of MAV 46f2df11
page.navLabel: Director of Mavin Duck Farm Branch (Member of MAV
page.jobTitle_s: Director of Mavin Duck Farm Branch (Member of MAVIN GROUP)
page.jobContent_html:
Number of recruitment: 1 person

Job description:

- Managing, supervising and operating the production and business activities of Duck-Farm segment at Dong Thap branch

- Making plan to develop processing breeding system

- Market organization - promote and introduce breeding ducks

- Managing and operating the hamlet

- Trading in accordance with regulations and effective development

- Organizing to build and orient the system development, administrative and personnel organization in branch activities, creating environment, conditions and motivation for staff development

- Be responsible to the company for the business results of the area in which they are responsible

Request:

- Graduated Veterinarian, Breeding Engineer, Agricultural Engineer, preferred Veterinarians, Livestock Engineer

- Experience in equivalent positions from 3 to less than 5 years

- There are new ideas in management and business

- Having leadership skills and organizational connection


Right:

- Income from 20 to 40 million / month, enjoy bonus according to the Company's regulations

- Enjoy all benefits of social insurance, health insurance, voluntary holidays, Tet according to current law

- Health care company (BHSK) 24/24

- Join and enjoy the rights of a union.


Profile request:

- Job application, certificate of conduct, health certificate (within 6 months).

- Identitycard household registration book (copy).

- Relevant diplomas and certificates.


Contact form:

- Apply directly at the company.

- Candidates applying by mail please scan diplomas, certificates, transcripts, CV and related documents sent to the Company mail: tuyendung@cailayvetco.com
